author: desruisseaux
msg: Applied more patch for upgrading to ISO 19115:2014 (SIS-94).

author: robbie
msg: PROTON-597: only release transport buffers if they are above a threshold capacity

author: robbie
msg: PROTON-597: remove use of the scratch buffer which will always be 512bytes due to minMaxFrameSize, and instead write bytes straight to the output buffer

author: robbie
msg: PROTON-597: update TransportOutputAdaptor and FrameParser to release buffers after use, reducing memory consumption when using large frame sizes

author: philip
msg: pool used by hash to fix a problem identified by valgrind.
